name: Use_Short_URL
description: This is functionally identical to the **POST /sms-campaigns/send** endpoint, other than adding the `smsg.us/xxxxx` string to the message body additional `url_to_shorten` parameter.

example.body: This is my new campaign message. Visit this url: smsg.us/xxxxx
example.name: My Campaign 1

schedule.description: Leave blank for immediate delivery. Your schedule time as a [unix timestamp](http://help.clicksend.com/what-is-a-unix-timestamp).

url_to_shorten.description: The URL you want to shorten (only required when using this feature). This must be only `http` or `https`.
